sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-flight-information', templateUrl: './flight-information.component.html', styleUrls: ['./flight-information.component.css'] }) export class FlightInformationComponent implements OnInit { constructor() { } ngOnInit() { } }
Flight Number {{element.flightNumber}} Origin {{element.origin}} Origin Date {{element.originDate | date: 'd/M/yyyy'}} Destination {{element.destination}} Destination Date {{element.destinationDate | date: 'd/M/yyyy'}}
